mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_NO, A.APP_NO, A.USER_EMAIL, A.USER_PASSWORD, A.USER_NAME, A.USER_BIRTH, A.USER_AGREE_1, A.USER_AGREE_2, A.USER_AGREE_3, A.USER_AGREE_4, A.USER_AGREE_5, B.REQUEST_DATE, B.USER_GENDER, B.USER_NATION, B.USER_ZIP, B.USER_ADDR, B.USER_ADDR_DTL, B.USER_CP, B.USER_TEL, B.USER_PROFILE FROM APP_USER A LEFT JOIN USER_INFO B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE A.USER_NO = #{USER_NO}
